summary.name: Conversion Analysis
summary.remarks: We analyze and optimize the conversion rate of websites and landing pages, providing actionable insights and solutions.

conversionAnalysis.title: Let's Conduct a Conversion Analysis to Increase Your Website's Traffic!
conversionAnalysis.description: Even though your website gets traffic, your conversion rate might not be increasing as expected, leading to stagnating sales and inquiries. Many companies face similar challenges and struggle to find effective strategies to boost their conversion rates.
conversionAnalysis.solution: By addressing these points through conversion analysis, we can accurately understand user needs and behaviors, leading to effective solutions. This will help improve your conversion rate and maximize business results.

cta.buttonText: Contact us for a free consultation!
cta.bubbleText: The consultation will be completed in just 1 minute. Contact us now!

summary.name: Website Development & Redesign
summary.remarks: We offer comprehensive website development, operation, improvement, and SEO services.

webDevelopment.title: Website Development & Redesign
webDevelopment.description: Your current website design may be outdated, failing to capture users' attention, and your SEO might not be strong enough to rank high in search engines, resulting in fewer new customers. Many businesses face similar issues and feel the need to improve their website but are unsure where to start.
webDevelopment.solution: By addressing these points and redesigning your website, we can make it more appealing to users, increasing traffic and helping you acquire new customers.

cta.myMessage: Let's increase traffic through your website!
cta.buttonText: Contact us for a free consultation!
cta.bubbleText: The consultation will be completed in just 1 minute. Contact us now!

summary.name: Email Marketing
summary.remarks: We maximize the follow-up and upselling opportunities by sending monthly email newsletters to your customer list.

mailMarketing.description: Do you feel like your methods of reaching out to customers are limited, and you are not communicating as effectively as you could? Many businesses face challenges in nurturing leads and improving customer engagement. Effective use of email marketing can solve these problems.
